attributes.action: The UK Should Leave The EU Without A Deal
attributes.additional_details:
92% of UK businesses do no trade with the EU. Those that do, in common with the rest of the world, can do so on the basis of World Trade Organisation rules. If the EU wishes at some future time to have mutual tariff free trade with the UK this can be offered without additional conditions on their part.   

The Government mustn't give a penny to the EU following the withdrawal date. The British people haven't given you a mandate to give our money to the EU, the mandate you have is to leave!
attributes.background: The British people voted to leave the EU. They didn't vote to be part in and part out of the EU! We want full control over our laws, immigration policy and to end all payments to the EU. We want to have control over animal welfare to ban live exports, the import of fur and foie gras.
